bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: EC of water/moisture stagnation resulting from spleen depletion or from moisture evil having offended the spleen, impairing the spleen’s potential of transporting/transforming liquid. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 84: 治脚氣之疾，先起嶺南，稍來江東， 皆由脾濕得之 , “To cure the ailment of leg qi. It originated in Lingnan and has reached the region east of the Yangzi river. The reason for getting it is always spleen moisture ”.
